not_a_restourant.title: Not a Restaurant
not_a_restourant.capter_1: Chef Simone Finetti will create an unforgettable experience with stories, tastings, and samplings of food and drinks selected specifically for the occasion.
not_a_restourant.capter_2: Discover gastronomy as you've never known it before.
not_a_restourant.capter_3: Learn about the origins of the foods themselves, their history, and the methods used to cook them

chose_menu.title: Take a Look at Our Menus
chose_menu.sub_title: Book your seat and experience a tasting show at Villa Albertina.
